languages.text: "Неужели мое тело страшнее ужасов варпа? Их вы рисуете без стеснения".
"Do you mean to tell me that my body is more hideous than all the horrors of the warp? After all, you do not shy away from painting them."
languages.original_text: "Неужели мое тело страшнее ужасов варпа? Их вы рисуете без стеснения".

traits.locale_text: "Do you mean to tell me that my body is more hideous than all the horrors of the warp? You do not shy away from painting them, after all."
"Do you mean to tell me that my body is more hideous than all the horrors of the warp? You do not shy away from painting them, after all."
"Do you mean to tell me that my body is more hideous than all the horrors of the warp? After all, you do not shy away from painting them."
"Do you mean to tell me that my body is more hideous than all the horrors of the warp? After all, you do not shy away from painting them."
"Do you mean to tell me that my body is more hideous than all the horrors of the warp? After all, you do not shy away from painting them."
"Do you mean to tell me that my body is more hideous than all the horrors of the warp? After all, you do not shy away from painting them."

languages.text: « Dois-je comprendre que mon corps est plus hideux que toutes les horreurs du Warp ? Vous n'avez pas peur de les peindre, elles. »
languages.original_text: "Do you mean to tell me that my body is more hideous than all the horrors of the warp? After all, you do not shy away from painting them."

traits.locale_text: « Dois-je comprendre que mon corps est plus hideux que toutes les horreurs du Warp ? Vous n'avez pas peur de les peindre, elles. »

languages.text: «¿Insinúa que mi cuerpo es más desagradable que todos los horrores de la disformidad? Porque no duda a la hora de retratarlos».
languages.original_text: "Do you mean to tell me that my body is more hideous than all the horrors of the warp? After all, you do not shy away from painting them."

traits.locale_text: «¿Insinúa que mi cuerpo es más desagradable que todos los horrores de la disformidad? Porque no duda a la hora de retratarlos».

languages.text: “莫非你的意思是说，我的身体比亚空间的恐怖之物更加可怕吗？毕竟那些东西你从来都不避讳。”
languages.original_text: "Do you mean to tell me that my body is more hideous than all the horrors of the warp? After all, you do not shy away from painting them."

traits.locale_text: “莫非你的意思是说，我的身体比亚空间的恐怖之物更加可怕吗？毕竟那些东西你从来都不避讳。”

languages.text: 「あなたは私の身体が<歪み>で起こった出来事よりも、恐ろしいとでもいいたいのか？少なくとも、あの出来事を描くのを恐れてはいないようだ」
languages.original_text: "Do you mean to tell me that my body is more hideous than all the horrors of the warp? After all, you do not shy away from painting them."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は私の身体が<歪み>で起こった出来事よりも、恐ろしいとでもいいたいのか？少なくとも、あの出来事を描くのを恐れてはいないようだ」

languages.text: "Wollt Ihr mir etwa sagen, dass mein Körper grauenhafter ist als all die Schrecken des Warps? Schließlich scheut Ihr nicht davor zurück, sie zu malen."
languages.original_text: "Do you mean to tell me that my body is more hideous than all the horrors of the warp? After all, you do not shy away from painting them."

traits.locale_text: "Wollt Ihr mir etwa sagen, dass mein Körper grauenhafter ist als all die Schrecken des Warps? Schließlich scheut Ihr nicht davor zurück, sie zu malen."

languages.text: "Bana bedenimin öteboyuttaki her türlü dehşetten daha korkunç olduğunu mu söylemeye çalışıyorsun? Nihayetinde onları resmetmekten geri durmuyorsun."
languages.original_text: "Do you mean to tell me that my body is more hideous than all the horrors of the warp? After all, you do not shy away from painting them."
